amendment.description: To require an Army study regarding use of a second source of production for gears incorporated into helicopter transmissions for CH-47 helicopters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 746 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 746 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S6838) To require an Army study regarding use of a second source of production for gears incorporated into helicopter transmissions for CH-47 helicopters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 746 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 746 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd.
